data.quote: The truth is you don’t know what is going to happen tomorrow. Life is a crazy ride, and nothing is guaranteed.
data.author: Eminem

data.quote: But music is reflection of self, we just explain it, and then we get our checks in the mail.
data.author: Eminem

data.quote: Success is my only option, failure’s not.
data.author: Eminem

data.quote: Love is just a word, but you bring it definition.
data.author: Eminem

data.quote: Everybody has goals, aspirations or whatever, and everybody has been at a point in their life where nobody believed in them.
data.author: Eminem

data.quote: Trust is hard to come by. That’s why my circle is small and tight. I’m kind of funny about making new friends.
data.author: Eminem
